alert.note: Alert for Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 02 at 3:25PM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Ice accumulations of two tenths to four tenths of an inch are possible. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kearney County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact travel this evening through Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is a tricky forecast where a degree of temperature change could impact icing amounts significantly. Similar...if colder air moves in, ice amounts may decrease and snow amounts would increase.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
